medical_history.chief_complaint: Patients presented with features of CHARGE syndrome and various endocrine abnormalities.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Both patients showed developmental delays and short stature at an early age; one exhibited height issues at 3 years and was treated with growth hormone starting at 7 years, while the second patient was treated with growth hormone at 3 years of age. Symptom progression included developmental delays and hormonal deficiencies.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Both patients have features associated with CHARGE syndrome, including developmental delays and structural abnormalities of the pituitary gland. The first patient was diagnosed with mild central hypothyroidism and severe growth hormone deficiency.
medical_history.family_history: Family members of the first patient exhibited similar features, with the mother carrying the same CHD7 variant and showing no CHARGE symptoms, while the patient's sister displayed growth hormone deficiency and other minor CHARGE features.
